titleStmt.title: A letter from an English reformed Quaker, to his friend in Scotland of the same perswasion: with the answer and reply thereto.
titleStmt.author: J. L.
G. H. aut

notesStmt.note: Signed: J.L.; the reply is signed: G.H.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
